Nightlight::


"I'll follow this corritor" said Nightlight "Perhaps in the control 
room I can find some one alive."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>        "He activates a projector in his palm and studies the map.  
He watches 
> the flashing lights showing where he, Nightlight, and Starstomp 
were.  He 
> responds.  "Alright.  I'm going to head to the engine room.  I'll 
see if I 
> can get the power back up."
